about_the_game:
Welcome to Grand Piano Simulator, the most realistic and immersive piano simulation experience ever created!

In this Early Access game, you'll step into the shoes of a virtuoso pianist and have the opportunity to practice, perform, and compose like never before.

With our meticulously crafted 3D environment , you'll feel like you're sitting at a real grand piano. Every note, every nuance of your playing will be captured in stunning detail.

The Early Access version of Grand Piano Simulator includes:

  • A fully functional 88-key grand piano

  • Several scenes: including a empty room, a living room, a forest, and a night forest.

  • Adjust the position and angle of the music stand and cover to suit your playing style and preferences.

  • Mouse, MIDI input.

  • Keyboard input. Key binding for easy chord and melody playing on a keyboard.

  • VRM avatar import.

The full release of Grand Piano Simulator will include:

Features:

  • Freely design and customize your performance space, from grand concert halls to intimate living rooms, with a variety of stage elements and decorations.

  • Import and play your favorite MIDI files, expanding your repertoire and exploring new musical possibilities.

We're committed to making Grand Piano Simulator the best piano simulation game on the market. With your help, we can make it even better. Join us in Early Access and help us shape the future of Grand Piano Simulator!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 7730, NVIDIA GeForce® GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step into the shoes of a virtuoso pianist and experience the thrill of playing a grand piano in the comfort of your home. Grand Piano Simulator offers an immersive and realistic simulation experience with stunning visuals, and a variety of features to unleash your musical creativity.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
